comprehensive overview: The Insight Segmentation and Registration Toolkit (ITK) is an open-source software system designed for image analysis, particularly with medical images. It provides a range of algorithms for segmentation, registration, feature extraction, and more.
core features: ITK offers tools for image segmentation, registration, filtering, feature extraction, and visualization. It supports 2D and 3D image processing and analysis, and provides a wide range of algorithms for medical image analysis.
